availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Franciska Kleiber Eye (Jefferson County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, resident. Native of Germany. Married to John Adam Eye in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on October 21, 1856. Mother of Barbara Philomena Eye, John Eye, Franziska Eye, and Henrietta Eye. Resident of Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville/Ward 3, p. 302B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #005553515.
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport (before 1911), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #7007129, Jefferson County Deaths, Book 15, p. 90.
KYR-0001-029-0099.
